This specific implementation is meant for when T: Clone, so that the reader lock is held for the least amount of time possible.
Here's the implementation: https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2021&gist=e585fd0dde1a1a6c79dacb8eca47ff23

I used only Acquire/Release, but some of them can probably be changed to Relaxed, but I'm a little scared to do that,
would mainly appreciate any feedback on the Condvar usage here.

the API is based on tokio::sync::watch, but I need this to be non-async.

Any feedback will be appreciated :)
